adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.desc: This Pokemon's same-type attack bonus (STAB) is 2 instead of 1.5.

aftermath.name: Aftermath
aftermath.desc: If this Pokemon is KOed with a contact move, that move's user loses 1/4 its max HP.

aerilate.name: Aerilate
aerilate.desc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Flying type and have 1.2x power.

airlock.name: Air Lock
airlock.desc: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

analytic.name: Analytic
analytic.desc: This Pokemon's attacks have 1.3x power if it is the last to move in a turn.

angerpoint.name: Anger Point
angerpoint.desc: If this Pokemon (not its substitute) takes a critical hit, its Attack is raised 12 stages.

anticipation.name: Anticipation
anticipation.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon shudders if any foe has a supereffective or OHKO move.

arenatrap.name: Arena Trap
arenatrap.desc: Prevents adjacent foes from choosing to switch unless they are airborne.

aromaveil.name: Aroma Veil
aromaveil.desc: Protects user/allies from Attract, Disable, Encore, Heal Block, Taunt, and Torment.

aurabreak.name: Aura Break
aurabreak.desc: While this Pokemon is active, the Dark Aura and Fairy Aura power modifier is 0.75x.

baddreams.name: Bad Dreams
baddreams.desc: Causes sleeping adjacent foes to lose 1/8 of their max HP at the end of each turn.

battery.name: Battery
battery.desc: This Pokemon's allies have the power of their special attacks multiplied by 1.3.

battlearmor.name: Battle Armor
battlearmor.desc: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

battlebond.name: Battle Bond
battlebond.desc: After KOing a Pokemon, this Pokemon becomes Ash-Greninja, Water Shuriken 20 power, hits 3x.

beastboost.name: Beast Boost
beastboost.desc: This Pokemon's highest stat is raised by 1 if it attacks and KOes another Pokemon.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.desc: This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 1 when it reaches 1/2 or less of its max HP.

bigpecks.name: Big Pecks
bigpecks.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Defense stat stage.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its max HP, its Fire attacks do 1.5x damage.

bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
bulletproof.desc: Makes user immune to ballistic moves (Shadow Ball, Sludge Bomb, Focus Blast, etc).

cheekpouch.name: Cheek Pouch
cheekpouch.desc: If this Pokemon eats a Berry, it restores 1/3 of its max HP after the Berry's effect.

chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.desc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

clearbody.name: Clear Body
clearbody.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

cloudnine.name: Cloud Nine
cloudnine.desc: While this Pokemon is active, the effects of weather conditions are disabled.

colorchange.name: Color Change
colorchange.desc: This Pokemon's type changes to the type of a move it's hit by, unless it has the type.

comatose.name: Comatose
comatose.desc: This Pokemon cannot be statused, and is considered to be asleep.

competitive.name: Competitive
competitive.desc: This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 2 for each of its stats that is lowered by a foe.

compoundeyes.name: Compound Eyes
compoundeyes.desc: This Pokemon's moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.3.

contrary.name: Contrary
contrary.desc: If this Pokemon has a stat stage raised it is lowered instead, and vice versa.

corrosion.name: Corrosion
corrosion.desc: This Pokemon can poison or badly poison other Pokemon regardless of their typing.

cursedbody.name: Cursed Body
cursedbody.desc: If this Pokemon is hit by an attack, there is a 30% chance that move gets disabled.

cutecharm.name: Cute Charm
cutecharm.desc: 30% chance of infatuating Pokemon of the opposite gender if they make contact.

damp.name: Damp
damp.desc: While this Pokemon is active, Self-Destruct, Explosion, and Aftermath have no effect.

dancer.name: Dancer
dancer.desc: After another Pokemon uses a dance move, this Pokemon uses the same move.

darkaura.name: Dark Aura
darkaura.desc: While this Pokemon is active, a Dark move used by any Pokemon has 1.33x power.

dazzling.name: Dazzling
dazzling.desc: While this Pokemon is active, allies are protected from opposing priority moves.

defeatist.name: Defeatist
defeatist.desc: While this Pokemon has 1/2 or less of its max HP, its Attack and Sp. Atk are halved.

defiant.name: Defiant
defiant.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 2 for each of its stats that is lowered by a foe.

deltastream.name: Delta Stream
deltastream.desc: On switch-in, strong winds begin until this Ability is not active in battle.

desolateland.name: Desolate Land
desolateland.desc: On switch-in, extremely harsh sunlight begins until this Ability is not active in battle.

disguise.name: Disguise
disguise.desc: If this Pokemon is a Mimikyu, it takes 0 damage the first time it is attacked in battle.

download.name: Download
download.desc: On switch-in, Attack or Sp. Atk is raised 1 stage based on the foes' weaker Defense.

drizzle.name: Drizzle
drizzle.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Rain Dance.

drought.name: Drought
drought.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sunny Day.

dryskin.name: Dry Skin
dryskin.desc: This Pokemon is healed 1/4 by Water, 1/8 by Rain; is hurt 1.25x by Fire, 1/8 by Sun.

earlybird.name: Early Bird
earlybird.desc: This Pokemon's sleep counter drops by 2 instead of 1.

effectspore.name: Effect Spore
effectspore.desc: 30% chance of poison/paralysis/sleep on others making contact with this Pokemon.

electricsurge.name: Electric Surge
electricsurge.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Electric Terrain.

emergencyexit.name: Emergency Exit
emergencyexit.desc: This Pokemon switches out when it reaches 1/2 or less of its maximum HP.

fairyaura.name: Fairy Aura
fairyaura.desc: While this Pokemon is active, a Fairy move used by any Pokemon has 1.33x power.

filter.name: Filter
filter.desc: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.

flamebody.name: Flame Body
flamebody.desc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be burned.

flareboost.name: Flare Boost
flareboost.desc: While this Pokemon is burned, its special attacks have 1.5x power.

flashfire.name: Flash Fire
flashfire.desc: This Pokemon's Fire attacks do 1.5x damage if hit by one Fire move; Fire immunity.

flowergift.name: Flower Gift
flowergift.desc: If user is Cherrim and Sunny Day is active, it and allies' Attack and Sp. Def are 1.5x.

flowerveil.name: Flower Veil
flowerveil.desc: This side's Grass types can't have stats lowered or status inflicted by other Pokemon.

fluffy.name: Fluffy
fluffy.desc: This Pokemon takes 1/2 damage from contact moves, 2x damage from Fire moves.

forecast.name: Forecast
forecast.desc: Castform's type changes to the current weather condition's type, except Sandstorm.

forewarn.name: Forewarn
forewarn.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon is alerted to the foes' move with the highest power.

friendguard.name: Friend Guard
friendguard.desc: This Pokemon's allies receive 3/4 damage from other Pokemon's attacks.

frisk.name: Frisk
frisk.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon identifies the held items of all opposing Pokemon.

fullmetalbody.name: Full Metal Body
fullmetalbody.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

galewings.name: Gale Wings
galewings.desc: If this Pokemon is at full HP, its Flying-type moves have their priority increased by 1.

galvanize.name: Galvanize
galvanize.desc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Electric type and have 1.2x power.

gluttony.name: Gluttony
gluttony.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/2 or less of its maximum HP, it uses certain Berries early.

gooey.name: Gooey
gooey.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Speed lowered by 1 stage.

grasspelt.name: Grass Pelt
grasspelt.desc: If Grassy Terrain is active, this Pokemon's Defense is multiplied by 1.5.

grassysurge.name: Grassy Surge
grassysurge.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Grassy Terrain.

guts.name: Guts
guts.desc: If this Pokemon is statused, its Attack is 1.5x; ignores burn halving physical damage.

harvest.name: Harvest
harvest.desc: If last item used is a Berry, 50% chance to restore it each end of turn. 100% in Sun.

healer.name: Healer
healer.desc: 30% chance of curing an adjacent ally's status at the end of each turn.

heatproof.name: Heatproof
heatproof.desc: The power of Fire-type attacks against this Pokemon is halved; burn damage halved.

hustle.name: Hustle
hustle.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is 1.5x and accuracy of its physical attacks is 0.8x.

hydration.name: Hydration
hydration.desc: This Pokemon has its status cured at the end of each turn if Rain Dance is active.

hypercutter.name: Hyper Cutter
hypercutter.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's Attack stat stage.

icebody.name: Ice Body
icebody.desc: If Hail is active, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP each turn; immunity to Hail.

illusion.name: Illusion
illusion.desc: This Pokemon appears as the last Pokemon in the party until it takes direct damage.

immunity.name: Immunity
immunity.desc: This Pokemon cannot be poisoned. Gaining this Ability while poisoned cures it.

imposter.name: Imposter
imposter.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon Transforms into the opposing Pokemon that is facing it.

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.desc: Moves ignore substitutes and opposing Reflect, Light Screen, Safeguard, and Mist.

innardsout.name: Innards Out
innardsout.desc: If this Pokemon is KOed with a move, that move's user loses an equal amount of HP.

innerfocus.name: Inner Focus
innerfocus.desc: This Pokemon cannot be made to flinch.

insomnia.name: Insomnia
insomnia.desc: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon lowers the Attack of adjacent opponents by 1 stage.

ironbarbs.name: Iron Barbs
ironbarbs.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their max HP.

ironfist.name: Iron Fist
ironfist.desc: This Pokemon's punch-based attacks have 1.2x power. Sucker Punch is not boosted.

justified.name: Justified
justified.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage after it is damaged by a Dark-type move.

keeneye.name: Keen Eye
keeneye.desc: This Pokemon's accuracy can't be lowered by others; ignores their evasiveness stat.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.desc: This Pokemon's held item has no effect, except Macho Brace. Fling cannot be used.

leafguard.name: Leaf Guard
leafguard.desc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon cannot be statused and Rest will fail for it.

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.desc: This Pokemon is immune to Ground; Gravity/Ingrain/Smack Down/Iron Ball nullify it.

lightningrod.name: Lightning Rod
lightningrod.desc: This Pokemon draws Electric moves to itself to raise Sp. Atk by 1; Electric immunity.

limber.name: Limber
limber.desc: This Pokemon cannot be paralyzed. Gaining this Ability while paralyzed cures it.

liquidooze.name: Liquid Ooze
liquidooze.desc: This Pokemon damages those draining HP from it for as much as they would heal.

liquidvoice.name: Liquid Voice
liquidvoice.desc: This Pokemon's sound-based moves become Water type.

longreach.name: Long Reach
longreach.desc: This Pokemon's attacks do not make contact with the target.

magicbounce.name: Magic Bounce
magicbounce.desc: This Pokemon blocks certain status moves and bounces them back to the user.

magicguard.name: Magic Guard
magicguard.desc: This Pokemon can only be damaged by direct attacks.

magician.name: Magician
magician.desc: If this Pokemon has no item, it steals the item off a Pokemon it hits with an attack.

magmaarmor.name: Magma Armor
magmaarmor.desc: This Pokemon cannot be frozen. Gaining this Ability while frozen cures it.

magnetpull.name: Magnet Pull
magnetpull.desc: Prevents adjacent Steel-type foes from choosing to switch.

marvelscale.name: Marvel Scale
marvelscale.desc: If this Pokemon is statused, its Defense is 1.5x.

megalauncher.name: Mega Launcher
megalauncher.desc: This Pokemon's pulse moves have 1.5x power. Heal Pulse heals 3/4 target's max HP.

merciless.name: Merciless
merciless.desc: This Pokemon's attacks are critical hits if the target is poisoned.

minus.name: Minus
minus.desc: If an active ally has this Ability or the Ability Plus, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.

mistysurge.name: Misty Surge
mistysurge.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Misty Terrain.

moldbreaker.name: Mold Breaker
moldbreaker.desc: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

moody.name: Moody
moody.desc: Raises a random stat by 2 and lowers another stat by 1 at the end of each turn.

motordrive.name: Motor Drive
motordrive.desc: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage if hit by an Electric move; Electric immunity.

moxie.name: Moxie
moxie.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is raised by 1 stage if it attacks and KOes another Pokemon.

multiscale.name: Multiscale
multiscale.desc: If this Pokemon is at full HP, damage taken from attacks is halved.

multitype.name: Multitype
multitype.desc: If this Pokemon is an Arceus, its type changes to match its held Plate or Z-Crystal.

mummy.name: Mummy
mummy.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Ability changed to Mummy.

naturalcure.name: Natural Cure
naturalcure.desc: This Pokemon has its major status condition cured when it switches out.

noguard.name: No Guard
noguard.desc: Every move used by or against this Pokemon will always hit.

normalize.name: Normalize
normalize.desc: This Pokemon's moves are changed to be Normal type and have 1.2x power.

oblivious.name: Oblivious
oblivious.desc: This Pokemon cannot be infatuated or taunted. Gaining this Ability cures it.

overcoat.name: Overcoat
overcoat.desc: This Pokemon is immune to powder moves and damage from Sandstorm or Hail.

overgrow.name: Overgrow
overgrow.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its max HP, its Grass attacks do 1.5x damage.

owntempo.name: Own Tempo
owntempo.desc: This Pokemon cannot be confused. Gaining this Ability while confused cures it.

parentalbond.name: Parental Bond
parentalbond.desc: This Pokemon's damaging moves hit twice. The second hit has its damage quartered.

pickup.name: Pickup
pickup.desc: If this Pokemon has no item, it finds one used by an adjacent Pokemon this turn.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.desc: If this Pokemon has no item, it steals the item off a Pokemon making contact with it.

pixilate.name: Pixilate
pixilate.desc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Fairy type and have 1.2x power.

plus.name: Plus
plus.desc: If an active ally has this Ability or the Ability Minus, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x.

poisonheal.name: Poison Heal
poisonheal.desc: This Pokemon is healed by 1/8 of its max HP each turn when poisoned; no HP loss.

poisonpoint.name: Poison Point
poisonpoint.desc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be poisoned.

poisontouch.name: Poison Touch
poisontouch.desc: This Pokemon's contact moves have a 30% chance of poisoning.

powerconstruct.name: Power Construct
powerconstruct.desc: If Zygarde 10%/50%, changes to Complete if at 1/2 max HP or less at end of turn.

powerofalchemy.name: Power of Alchemy
powerofalchemy.desc: This Pokemon copies the Ability of an ally that faints.

prankster.name: Prankster
prankster.desc: This Pokemon's Status moves have priority raised by 1, but Dark types are immune.

pressure.name: Pressure
pressure.desc: If this Pokemon is the target of a foe's move, that move loses one additional PP.

primordialsea.name: Primordial Sea
primordialsea.desc: On switch-in, heavy rain begins until this Ability is not active in battle.

prismarmor.name: Prism Armor
prismarmor.desc: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.

protean.name: Protean
protean.desc: This Pokemon's type changes to match the type of the move it is about to use.

psychicsurge.name: Psychic Surge
psychicsurge.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Psychic Terrain.

queenlymajesty.name: Queenly Majesty
queenlymajesty.desc: While this Pokemon is active, allies are protected from opposing priority moves.

quickfeet.name: Quick Feet
quickfeet.desc: If this Pokemon is statused, its Speed is 1.5x; ignores Speed drop from paralysis.

raindish.name: Rain Dish
raindish.desc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon heals 1/16 of its max HP each turn.

rattled.name: Rattled
rattled.desc: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage if hit by a Bug-, Dark-, or Ghost-type attack.

receiver.name: Receiver
receiver.desc: This Pokemon copies the Ability of an ally that faints.

reckless.name: Reckless
reckless.desc: This Pokemon's attacks with recoil or crash damage have 1.2x power; not Struggle.

refrigerate.name: Refrigerate
refrigerate.desc: This Pokemon's Normal-type moves become Ice type and have 1.2x power.

regenerator.name: Regenerator
regenerator.desc: This Pokemon restores 1/3 of its maximum HP, rounded down, when it switches out.

rivalry.name: Rivalry
rivalry.desc: This Pokemon's attacks do 1.25x on same gender targets; 0.75x on opposite gender.

rkssystem.name: RKS System
rkssystem.desc: If this Pokemon is a Silvally, its type changes to match its held Memory.

rockhead.name: Rock Head
rockhead.desc: This Pokemon does not take recoil damage besides Struggle/Life Orb/crash damage.

roughskin.name: Rough Skin
roughskin.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon lose 1/8 of their max HP.

sandforce.name: Sand Force
sandforce.desc: This Pokemon's Ground/Rock/Steel attacks do 1.3x in Sandstorm; immunity to it.

sandrush.name: Sand Rush
sandrush.desc: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled; immunity to Sandstorm.

sandstream.name: Sand Stream
sandstream.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sandstorm.

sandveil.name: Sand Veil
sandveil.desc: If Sandstorm is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is 1.25x; immunity to Sandstorm.

sapsipper.name: Sap Sipper
sapsipper.desc: This Pokemon's Attack is raised 1 stage if hit by a Grass move; Grass immunity.

schooling.name: Schooling
schooling.desc: If user is Wishiwashi, changes to School Form if it has > 1/4 max HP, else Solo Form.

scrappy.name: Scrappy
scrappy.desc: This Pokemon can hit Ghost types with Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

serenegrace.name: Serene Grace
serenegrace.desc: This Pokemon's moves have their secondary effect chance doubled.

shadowshield.name: Shadow Shield
shadowshield.desc: If this Pokemon is at full HP, damage taken from attacks is halved.

shadowtag.name: Shadow Tag
shadowtag.desc: Prevents adjacent foes from choosing to switch unless they also have this Ability.

shedskin.name: Shed Skin
shedskin.desc: This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its status cured at the end of each turn.

sheerforce.name: Sheer Force
sheerforce.desc: This Pokemon's attacks with secondary effects have 1.3x power; nullifies the effects.

shellarmor.name: Shell Armor
shellarmor.desc: This Pokemon cannot be struck by a critical hit.

shielddust.name: Shield Dust
shielddust.desc: This Pokemon is not affected by the secondary effect of another Pokemon's attack.

shieldsdown.name: Shields Down
shieldsdown.desc: If Minior, switch-in/end of turn it changes to Core at 1/2 max HP or less, else Meteor.

simple.name: Simple
simple.desc: If this Pokemon's stat stages are raised or lowered, the effect is doubled instead.

skilllink.name: Skill Link
skilllink.desc: This Pokemon's multi-hit attacks always hit the maximum number of times.

slowstart.name: Slow Start
slowstart.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon's Attack and Speed are halved for 5 turns.

slushrush.name: Slush Rush
slushrush.desc: If Hail is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled; immunity to Hail.

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.desc: If this Pokemon strikes with a critical hit, the damage is multiplied by 1.5.

snowcloak.name: Snow Cloak
snowcloak.desc: If Hail is active, this Pokemon's evasiveness is 1.25x; immunity to Hail.

snowwarning.name: Snow Warning
snowwarning.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Hail.

solarpower.name: Solar Power
solarpower.desc: If Sunny Day is active, this Pokemon's Sp. Atk is 1.5x; loses 1/8 max HP per turn.

solidrock.name: Solid Rock
solidrock.desc: This Pokemon receives 3/4 damage from supereffective attacks.

soulheart.name: Soul-Heart
soulheart.desc: This Pokemon's Sp. Atk is raised by 1 stage when another Pokemon faints.

soundproof.name: Soundproof
soundproof.desc: This Pokemon is immune to sound-based moves, including Heal Bell.

speedboost.name: Speed Boost
speedboost.desc: This Pokemon's Speed is raised 1 stage at the end of each full turn on the field.

stakeout.name: Stakeout
stakeout.desc: This Pokemon's attacks deal double damage if the target switched in this turn.

stall.name: Stall
stall.desc: This Pokemon moves last among Pokemon using the same or greater priority moves.

stamina.name: Stamina
stamina.desc: This Pokemon's Defense is raised by 1 stage after it is damaged by a move.

stancechange.name: Stance Change
stancechange.desc: If Aegislash, changes Forme to Blade before attacks and Shield before King's Shield.

static.name: Static
static.desc: 30% chance a Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon will be paralyzed.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.desc: If this Pokemon flinches, its Speed is raised by 1 stage.

steelworker.name: Steelworker
steelworker.desc: This Pokemon's Steel-type attacks have their power multiplied by 1.5.

stench.name: Stench
stench.desc: This Pokemon's attacks without a chance to flinch have a 10% chance to flinch.

stickyhold.name: Sticky Hold
stickyhold.desc: This Pokemon cannot lose its held item due to another Pokemon's attack.

stormdrain.name: Storm Drain
stormdrain.desc: This Pokemon draws Water moves to itself to raise Sp. Atk by 1; Water immunity.

strongjaw.name: Strong Jaw
strongjaw.desc: This Pokemon's bite-based attacks have 1.5x power. Bug Bite is not boosted.

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.desc: If this Pokemon is at full HP, it survives one hit with at least 1 HP. Immune to OHKO.

suctioncups.name: Suction Cups
suctioncups.desc: This Pokemon cannot be forced to switch out by another Pokemon's attack or item.

superluck.name: Super Luck
superluck.desc: This Pokemon's critical hit ratio is raised by 1 stage.

surgesurfer.name: Surge Surfer
surgesurfer.desc: If Electric Terrain is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its max HP, its Bug attacks do 1.5x damage.

sweetveil.name: Sweet Veil
sweetveil.desc: This Pokemon and its allies cannot fall asleep.

swiftswim.name: Swift Swim
swiftswim.desc: If Rain Dance is active, this Pokemon's Speed is doubled.

symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
symbiosis.desc: If an ally uses its item, this Pokemon gives its item to that ally immediately.

synchronize.name: Synchronize
synchronize.desc: If another Pokemon burns/poisons/paralyzes this Pokemon, it also gets that status.

tangledfeet.name: Tangled Feet
tangledfeet.desc: This Pokemon's evasiveness is doubled as long as it is confused.

tanglinghair.name: Tangling Hair
tanglinghair.desc: Pokemon making contact with this Pokemon have their Speed lowered by 1 stage.

technician.name: Technician
technician.desc: This Pokemon's moves of 60 power or less have 1.5x power. Includes Struggle.

telepathy.name: Telepathy
telepathy.desc: This Pokemon does not take damage from attacks made by its allies.

teravolt.name: Teravolt
teravolt.desc: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

thickfat.name: Thick Fat
thickfat.desc: Fire/Ice-type moves against this Pokemon deal damage with a halved attacking stat.

tintedlens.name: Tinted Lens
tintedlens.desc: This Pokemon's attacks that are not very effective on a target deal double damage.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.desc: When this Pokemon has 1/3 or less of its max HP, its Water attacks do 1.5x damage.

toxicboost.name: Toxic Boost
toxicboost.desc: While this Pokemon is poisoned, its physical attacks have 1.5x power.

toughclaws.name: Tough Claws
toughclaws.desc: This Pokemon's contact moves have their power multiplied by 1.3.

trace.name: Trace
trace.desc: On switch-in, or when it can, this Pokemon copies a random adjacent foe's Ability.

triage.name: Triage
triage.desc: This Pokemon's healing moves have their priority increased by 3.

truant.name: Truant
truant.desc: This Pokemon skips every other turn instead of using a move.

turboblaze.name: Turboblaze
turboblaze.desc: This Pokemon's moves and their effects ignore the Abilities of other Pokemon.

unaware.name: Unaware
unaware.desc: This Pokemon ignores other Pokemon's stat stages when taking or doing damage.

unburden.name: Unburden
unburden.desc: Speed is doubled on held item loss; boost is lost if it switches, gets new item/Ability.

unnerve.name: Unnerve
unnerve.desc: While this Pokemon is active, it prevents opposing Pokemon from using their Berries.

victorystar.name: Victory Star
victorystar.desc: This Pokemon and its allies' moves have their accuracy multiplied by 1.1.

vitalspirit.name: Vital Spirit
vitalspirit.desc: This Pokemon cannot fall asleep. Gaining this Ability while asleep cures it.

voltabsorb.name: Volt Absorb
voltabsorb.desc: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Electric moves; Electric immunity.

waterabsorb.name: Water Absorb
waterabsorb.desc: This Pokemon heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Water moves; Water immunity.

waterbubble.name: Water Bubble
waterbubble.desc: This Pokemon's Water power is 2x; it can't be burned; Fire power against it is halved.

watercompaction.name: Water Compaction
watercompaction.desc: This Pokemon's Defense is raised 2 stages after it is damaged by a Water-type move.

waterveil.name: Water Veil
waterveil.desc: This Pokemon cannot be burned. Gaining this Ability while burned cures it.

weakarmor.name: Weak Armor
weakarmor.desc: If a physical attack hits this Pokemon, Defense is lowered by 1, Speed is raised by 2.

whitesmoke.name: White Smoke
whitesmoke.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stat stages.

wimpout.name: Wimp Out
wimpout.desc: This Pokemon switches out when it reaches 1/2 or less of its maximum HP.

wonderguard.name: Wonder Guard
wonderguard.desc: This Pokemon can only be damaged by supereffective moves and indirect damage.

wonderskin.name: Wonder Skin
wonderskin.desc: Status moves with accuracy checks are 50% accurate when used on this Pokemon.

zenmode.name: Zen Mode
zenmode.desc: If Darmanitan, at end of turn changes Mode to Standard if > 1/2 max HP, else Zen.

mountaineer.name: Mountaineer
mountaineer.desc: On switch-in, this Pokemon avoids all Rock-type attacks and Stealth Rock.

rebound.name: Rebound
rebound.desc: On switch-in, blocks certain status moves and bounces them back to the user.

persistent.name: Persistent
persistent.desc: The duration of certain field effects is increased by 2 turns if used by this Pokemon.
